sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Tammy Dugan
Jun Wang
diff.description: Insert a task schedule (to run once a week) for archiving log files.
diff.sql: INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config (`name`, `schedulable_class`, `start_time`, `start_time_pattern`, `repeat_interval`, `start_on_startup`, `started`, `created_by`, `date_created`, `uuid`) SELECT 'Cron job archiving Tomcat log files','org.openmrs.module.chirdlutil.LogArchiveCron', NOW(), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss', 604800, 1, 0, 1, NOW(), UUID() FROM (select count(*) as cnt from scheduler_task_config where name='Cron job archiving Tomcat log files') a WHERE a.cnt=0;

diff.author: Steve McKee
diff.description: Create new event_log table for audit trail handling.
diff.sql: create table if not exists chirdlutil_event_log ( event_id int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, location_id int(11) NULL, form_id int(11) NULL, study_id int (11) NULL, user_id int(11) NOT NULL, event varchar(255) NOT NULL, event_time datetime NOT NULL, description varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (event_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.description: Changed location of SSN validator class

diff.author: David Ely
diff.description: CHICA-221 Create new encounter_role record as part of the Openmrs upgrade. Openmrs has created new provider records based on providers that were found in the encounter table. New encounter_provider records were also created to map each of the providers to the encounter table. The provider_id column was then removed from the encounter table. Create a new encounter_role called Attending Provider then assign this role to all encounter_provider records that were created by Openmrs.
